BATTING:
create or replace TABLE BATTING (
	PLAYER_ID VARCHAR(16777216),
	YEAR NUMBER(38,0),
	STINT NUMBER(38,0),
	TEAM_ID VARCHAR(16777216),
	LEAGUE_ID VARCHAR(16777216),
	G NUMBER(38,0),
	AB NUMBER(38,0),
	R NUMBER(38,0),
	H NUMBER(38,0),
	DOUBLE NUMBER(38,0),
	TRIPLE NUMBER(38,0),
	HR NUMBER(38,0),
	RBI NUMBER(38,0),
	SB NUMBER(38,0),
	CS NUMBER(38,0),
	BB NUMBER(38,0),
	SO NUMBER(38,0),
	IBB NUMBER(38,0),
	HBP NUMBER(38,0),
	SH NUMBER(38,0),
	SF NUMBER(38,0),
	G_IDP NUMBER(38,0)
);
PLAYER:
create or replace TABLE PLAYER (
	PLAYER_ID VARCHAR(16777216),
	BIRTH_YEAR NUMBER(38,0),
	BIRTH_MONTH NUMBER(38,0),
	BIRTH_DAY NUMBER(38,0),
	BIRTH_COUNTRY VARCHAR(16777216),
	BIRTH_STATE VARCHAR(16777216),
	BIRTH_CITY VARCHAR(16777216),
	DEATH_YEAR NUMBER(38,0),
	DEATH_MONTH NUMBER(38,0),
	DEATH_DAY NUMBER(38,0),
	DEATH_COUNTRY VARCHAR(16777216),
	DEATH_STATE VARCHAR(16777216),
	DEATH_CITY VARCHAR(16777216),
	NAME_FIRST VARCHAR(16777216),
	NAME_LAST VARCHAR(16777216),
	NAME_GIVEN VARCHAR(16777216),
	WEIGHT NUMBER(38,0),
	HEIGHT NUMBER(38,0),
	BATS VARCHAR(16777216),
	THROWS VARCHAR(16777216),
	DEBUT DATE,
	FINAL_GAME DATE,
	RETRO_ID VARCHAR(16777216),
	BBREF_ID VARCHAR(16777216)
);
